competitors.name: CyberArk
competitors.notes: Primary competitor for Vault in secrets and privileged access management

competitors.name: Pulumi
competitors.notes: Infrastructure as code using real programming languages

competitors.name: Akeyless Vault
competitors.notes: Unified vault management for DevOps credentials

context: By 2020, HashiCorp was established in infrastructure automation and secrets management. Released Boundary in 2020. Cloud providers offered native alternatives (AWS Secrets Manager, Azure Key Vault). Pulumi emerged as notable Terraform competitor.
